content:
MdiClient Class

In this Article

Represents the container for multiple-document interface (MDI) child forms. This class cannot be inherited.

Syntax

Declaration

[System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisible(false)]
[System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItem(false)]
[System.Runtime.InteropServices.ClassInterface(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ClassInterfaceType.AutoDispatch)]
[System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisible(true)]
public sealed class MdiClient : System.Windows.Forms.Control

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • MarshalByRefObject
  • Component
  • System.Windows.Forms.Control
  • MdiClient

Remarks

You should not create an MdiClient control. A form creates and uses the MdiClient when you set the IsMdiContainer property to true.

Constructors summary

MdiClient()

Initializes a new instance of the MdiClient class.

Gets or sets the background image displayed in the MdiClient control.
BackgroundImageLayout

This property is not relevant to this class.
CreateParams
MdiChildren

Gets the child multiple-document interface (MDI) forms of the MdiClient control.

Properties

  • BackgroundImage

    Gets or sets the background image displayed in the MdiClient control.

    public override System.Drawing.Image BackgroundImage { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Image

      An Image that represents the image to display in the background of the control.

    Remarks

    Use the BackgroundImage property to get and set the background image of a forms MDI client area.

  • BackgroundImageLayout

    Gets the child multiple-document interface (MDI) forms of the MdiClient control.

    public System.Windows.Forms.Form[] MdiChildren { get; }

      A Form array that contains the child MDI forms of the MdiClient.

    Remarks

    Use the MdiChildren property to get the child MDI forms of the MdiClient.
